description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Chester, United Kingdom. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Chester Contemporary Luxury in the Heart of Historic Roman City
hotels.description: Find a splash of contemporary luxury in the midst of Chester's historic Roman centre at Hotel Indigo Chester, an IHG Hotel, just a short walk from the 2,000-year-old city walls. While you're here be sure to dine among the elegant leather booths, sparkling glassware and wine-laden walls of The Forge, a sophisticated bar and grill headed by Head Chef Mike Robinson and fuelled by his passion for wild, sustainable British ingredients and simple cooking over fire and charcoal.

hotels.title: UK Sophisticated Chester City Break near Historic City Centre
hotels.description: Between picturesque cobblestone streets, historic Roman fortifications and endless emerald Welsh hills sits Crowne Plaza Chester, an IHG Hotel. After days exploring the city’s tremendous heritage - including the oldest racecourse in Britain and the country’s largest Roman amphitheatre, both less than a 10-minute walk away - retreat to Stables Bar and Grill Restaurant for laidback plates celebrating racing’s golden age or savour moments spent by the hotel’s shimmering indoor pool.
